subject: Sony Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams beat Maria Sharapova for the 15th consecutive time, rallying in both sets to win by 6-4, 6-3 in the Sony Open semifinals in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Serena Williams beat Maria Sharapova for the 15th consecutive time, rallying in both sets to win by 6-4, 6-3 in the Sony Open semifinals in Key Biscayne, Fla.
